thread.title: Azalina: 'Vocal' Kit Siang should assist forex task force
thread.title_full: Azalina: 'Vocal' Kit Siang should assist forex task force

title: Azalina: 'Vocal' Kit Siang should assist forex task force
text:
More 
DAP veteran Lim Kit Siang should assist the special task force recently set up to probe the foreign exchange losses incurred by Bank Negara Malaysia (BNM), more than two decades ago. 
"He should be the first man to support the task force," said Minister in the Prime Minister's Department Azalina Othman Said in a statement today. 
"This is because he was so vocal in the 1990s in the Dewan Rakyat by bringing up various motions to propose the setting up of a Royal Commission of Inquiry (RCI) to probe the losses. 
For the rest of this story and more, subscribe for only RM150 a year. If you're already a subscriber, please sign in.
